website_summaries.verdict: Adjustable tripod supports heavy media devices.
pros: Pairs with devices in mere seconds
Will make believers out of those who previously hadn't used a selfie stick, with supporting devices that create quality media for vlogs, professional videos and everyday use
cons: The phone mount could be more secure

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Selfie Stick
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth easy to pair... great great shots! Very lite weight. The picture with me in the red, is me holding the stick. The other is using the tripod.. Works GREAT! Wish I would have purchased this sooner! Thank you!!! I've recommended this to several buddies...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Saint

customer_reviews.title: Nice Monopod
customer_reviews.text: I discarded most of the items that are furnished with this device to make this a selfie stick. I do not do selfies! Then I added a short handgrip and a spike at the bottom of the extendable Monopod to gain some height and now have the perfect Monopod for my new Sony RX100vi camera!! It is ultra light, easy to operate and very sturdy and is just what I needed to steady my small camera, specially at the long focal length.
customer_reviews.author: KS56

customer_reviews.title: Best Selfie Stick/tripod!! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this to replace my broken one and found this in Amazon market place with good price. Have done some searchs and compared with similar products. This one has durable metal and 59 in long meet my requirement. Right out of the box I was very impressed with the high quality plastic used in the making of this selfie stick/tripod! Bluetooth remote Connected with ease to my iPhone iPad. when you have this. You can take excellent landscape background of yourself with their remote.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Y

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprise gift for my Mom , who immediately fell in love with her new selfie stick. The remote control ensured that we will have more perfect and COMPLETE family pictures moving forward. The tripod helps alot works great to take long video and group photos ! Works great on both GoPro & Large android devices
customer_reviews.author: Dan Daus

customer_reviews.title: Great "Tripod Extension"
customer_reviews.text: If you want to put your GoPro up higher above your tripod ... this is the "selfie stick" to use! Very sturdy, easy to extend and lock. Solid build. Solid female 1/4" threaded camera mount in base. I use a tripod with a quick connect base that I just leave mounted on this selfie stick. That way my GoPro can be high above the sports action for a much better angle. I have recommended this selfie stick as a "Tripod Extension" to everyone that asked. Much more solid than my last one that eventually wore out.
customer_reviews.author: Eroomjt

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money and cheaply made Bluetooth Selfie Stick with Tripod
customer_reviews.text: When using as a tripod with a cell phone to shoot video the extendable stick will not hold at all portions and keeps sliding down. Waste of my money and wish I could return this for a refund. Also the remote bluetooth button does not work to film video to start or end.
customer_reviews.author: OPSEC MM

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Remote Already Broken
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disappointed in this product, specifically with the bluetooth remote control - which is a necessary piece for why I purchased this tripod to begin with. It's been just over two months, and it's already broken. Just blinks over and over, not actually taking a photo.
customer_reviews.author: Katie in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Remote very erratic!
customer_reviews.text: The Selfie stick itself is great but when extended it has a tendency to sway a little especially on a windy day. I feel that the tripod feature is a little flimsy. My biggest complaint though is the Blue Tooth remote (Kulger) that would allow you to activate the camera from a distance does not always work. I changed the battery but that did not solve the problem. That is the most important feature of a selfie stick. If that doesn't work then it defeats the purpose of using a selfie stick.
customer_reviews.author: Vinchenzo

customer_reviews.title: Nice selfie stick with base, but Bluetooth trigger doesn't work with iOS 12.0
customer_reviews.text: Be aware: the Bluetooth shutter trigger is not compatible with iOS 12.0 , I tried many times - doesn't work with my iPhone XS Max but works with iPhone 7 (iOS 11.4) The base is OK and stable enough if not windy or you don't extend the selfie to max length. The mechanism to extend and collapse can be better - it is very stiff and not smooth at all to collapse the stick. I worry that it may break if I twist it every time I want to collapse it.
customer_reviews.author: D.P.

customer_reviews.title: The products quality is good. Talking about the tripod itself.
customer_reviews.text: I return this product back because the Remote is out of order, Don't work, I replace the Battery with a brand new one thinking that the trouble might be the battery but still, don't work, I assume, the remote is defective. Otherwise, the tripod and extensions were all in good condition and have a good quality except for the remote.
customer_reviews.author: J. Samson

customer_reviews.title: Broke on me
customer_reviews.text: For the price this thing is awesome! I like to use it as a tripod and the Bluetooth works great. Nice if you need to take photos of yourself. UPDATED: My phone snapped right off this thing and the attachment broke completely. I am not sure if it’s my fault or product but I don’t think it should have snapped in two after only a couple times use
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool selfie stick, very sturdy and it also works great as tripod!
customer_reviews.text: I got this stick since I do quite a bit of videos with my gopro and my phone. I was looking for something portable but that had good functionality. This selfie stick checked all my boxes. Its can be extended ALOT, which helps to get some cool shots. The other neat thing is how it the feet can be separated from the stick and the feet can then be used standalone as a mini tripod. The gopro can mount directly to it with it or a phone can be mounted using the included cellphone mount. I do wish they sold it in different colors, I think this would look very good in red top match the rest of my equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sanz

customer_reviews.title: Best selfie stick I own.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this just before leaving for a trip and wanted a more sturdy and longer selfie stick than the others that I have. This one is all of that. I framed up some great shots of me on my camping trip, and the included tripod stand allowed me to set it down for hands-free operation. I have two or three other selfie sticks, and this one is by far the best. It is one of those must-have tools for selfie/documentary video and still images. I only used the remote a couple of time for iPhone. I mainly use this with an action camera.
customer_reviews.author: Michelangelo Flores

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile in Uses and Devices
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about this device is how versatile it is, both in how many items it can accommodate as well as how it can be used. You can use it for cell phones, action cameras, tablets and as a tripod or a selfie stick. The bluetooth remote can be paired with cell phones as well for control from a bit away. The tripod has a pretty big base and it actually gets pretty high where you don't need to worry about setting it on top of something because it stands pretty high itself. It's definitely one of the better selfie sticks I have tested.
customer_reviews.author: Candid Tech TV

customer_reviews.title: Selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: I use this more to take pictures as a stand, when 3 legs are open to hold stick it leans to a side, it bothers a little but i needed a 2nd and i hoped it was just one that was faulty but the 2nd did same thing. Everything works good it doesnt feel like cheap material i now have 2 that i use but i just wished when used standing it didnt have that lean or better yet better opening legs to hold. Still a good deal and the lean is nothing crazy where you would notice in a picture but im contantly using it and now that i notice its at a lean it bothers me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin J.

customer_reviews.title: Works on my oversized phone!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing about this stick is that I can use it with my large phone without removing my case. It's a strong stick and can hold the weight of good camera. I only gave it a four star because it is a little bulky and will be difficult to carry on vacation The tripod works for a quick setup but I don't think it would hold up to a strong wind. (I haven't seen one that is truly sturdy yet) The phone grip does not like to hold my case securely and so I will have an elastic band or twist tie to help it out when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: BootheDeafKitty

customer_reviews.title: Broken w/in a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: This tripod was such a disappointment for me! ;( it only lasted me about 3 weeks before it finally broke. I ended up putting my phone on it & the whole thing snapped, dropping my phone & shattering my screen. Within a week, the tripod was leaning to the side & didn’t stand up straight... within maybe 2 weeks, the wireless remote died. & within 3 weeks, it completely fell apart! I will be looking for a sturdier tripod, as I thought the convince of this would be worth it, but it definitely isn’t! :(
customer_reviews.author: KAZIM ANIL KORKMAZ

customer_reviews.title: Great selfie-stick that also makes it easy to record videos. Very versatile and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this selfie stick for a while, and I love that it allows me to do my favorite selfies but also gives me some stability when recording videos. Affordable addition to my content creating process. Love that it comes with a tripod for stability, and that gives you great reach when it comes to adjusting height. For content creators this is a must. Great selfie-stick that also makes it easy to record videos.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus Webb

customer_reviews.title: Good for traveling, easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I got this before my long trip with the family. This folds nicely so easy to travel with. Can be used as a tripod as well, so we took a lot of family pics. The bluetooth connects well and finds the device easily, we paired at least 3 phones with it. Just the remote should have been usb chargeable. I'm not too fond of batteries as they tend to die and I might not be around stores everytime Other than that, this is a great device to gift to older family members too. Very easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: BeeNii

customer_reviews.title: Weak tripod base
customer_reviews.text: The shaft is nice and sturdy with great height. The phone holder is large and compatible with most phones. Will not fit the iPhone 11 in many protective cases though. The only negative which is very important to me is the tripod base. It's weak and flimsy at the joints. I took mine out the first time and it fell over breaking my phone. It's also very difficult to get it to stand straight because of the weak tripod
customer_reviews.author: Micky Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Not Stable with ipad in portrait
customer_reviews.text: The tripod is not stable and it just unlocked itself and fell in the midst of me recording. I am tempted to send back but my babies fell in love with the bluetooth selfie button conflicted right now. Oh yeah and if you want to record with ipad in portrait it hangs to the side sometimes moving stand from where you put it. I think if it was able to stand right above stand instead on the side it might not slip out of lock and be tilting over. My reviews of it but besides that it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: AHenderson

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Could be much better.
customer_reviews.text: The height is great. But it’s a bit wobbly. I mean it’s not going to rip over or anything. I don’t like the locking mechanism. You have to rotate each piece to tighten it as you extend it. If you don’t, it collapses.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: It saved our trip to Hawaii. ALMOST perfect, but is a little bit too heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good selfie stick and I am really glad I got it. It pretty much has everything you need: the remote control, can transform into monopod and is really LONG. The only real concern is that it is quite heavy for hiking, and we had to do a lot of hiking on Maui. It would be a killer if it was a little bit lighter, but then probably the monopod wouldn't be as sturdy and safe. Overall, I really like it and am glad that I purchased it before our trip
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Grreat selfie stick, very versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I hate selfie sticks, but I needed to use one to shoot a "follow me" video. This one is nice and long, so it gives a nice perspective with a GoPro or similar camera. If your camera has Blue Tooth start and stop, the little BT button is veery handy. It has legs that allow you to stand it up and walk away from it or toward it, Very compact for carrying and quite sturdy as well. I have used it with a Lumix G9 mirrorless camera as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rockroom

customer_reviews.title: Great selfie stick except for....
customer_reviews.text: Was thrilled with the selfie stick. Great length, sturdy, worked well ...until the bluetooth remote fell off and was lost. The remote is loosely slipped over the stick ...not at all secure. MFW said a remote could be purchased through their store but I can't locate a store and they didn't give any sort of link to find a store (other than on Amazon and no remote was found there). This would be a winner if the remote was secure but now I'm looking for another selfie stick.
customer_reviews.author: K Tate

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: This tripod is great! It all comes apart so I could add the phone hook to my full size tripod. The way the holder grabs your phone allows for the phone to be vertical or horizontal. The remote worked great and even came with a battery. I had no trouble pairing it with my phone. I’ve included a few test shots. I hope my description was of use to you! —Follow @CassandraMercedes on Instagram for more amazing Amazon finds!—
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Mercedes Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Well Built Selfie Stick!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality selfie stick. Really like having the selfie stick and tripod all in one. Tightens down really well when adjusted and the Bluetooth button is great. It’s really nice being able to set up the stick on the tripod and take pics with the button! ***Please feel free to follow me or ask me questions about my review. I spend a lot of time researching and understanding these products before I make the decision to buy. My reviews are my honest opinion after my research and time spent thoroughly testing the product. If you found this to be “Helpful”, please click on “Helpful” beneath this review. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Drewsak

customer_reviews.title: Worth the amount of money
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with the money I spent on this product, the only thing is at the bottom when you screw in the tripod to the selfie stick, it’s a little wobbly. Nothing too major that I would be worried about my phone. But it does catch My eye time to time. I also could not figure out how to get my Bluetooth button to work. I am very tech savvy and even I couldn’t figure this out. It also talked about the pin, which I did not receive.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: The remote
customer_reviews.text: The remote is useless. It did not work I even change the battery and still did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Chiugo

customer_reviews.title: No manual, no battery, seems a returned item
customer_reviews.text: There is no battery in the remote and, worse, there is no manual. I don't know what battery type to buy to put in. All other items look good with expected quality. I bought this after reading so many other people's good comments and it seems there is battery coming with the remote and the pairing should be very easy! So I doubt I received a returned item without proper QC/QA check. Anybody can tell me what type of battery to buy?
customer_reviews.author: Simon Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great Selfie Stick!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a couple of different selfie sticks but this one is the best I've owned. Very sturdy construction and great features. Having the ability to stand it on it's own legs or attach it to your own tripod are excellent features! The remote paired easily with my iPhone and works perfectly! I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Phil Sutphin

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend who loves to take all kinds of pictures, especially from afar when he travels, and is always thinking of crazy ways to set his phone up with a timer... this foldable tripod makes things sooo much easier. It's super collapsible and not insanely heavy (though admittedly it does add a little bit of weight to your bag). It's been about 7 months since I bought it for him and it's still holding up strong.
customer_reviews.author: Maren Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Remote: flawed design, no obstructions on how to remove battery.
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered and the packaging was lacking. No box, no insstructions just plastic bags. I bought this as a christmas gift and was inspecting it to make sure all the parts were there. When I opened the remote to see the type of battery it's using I noticed that there was no way to take it out. In try the polate that held it broke off, rendering it useless. I picked this tripod set for the remote so I paid for something that now doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: ChgoRican

customer_reviews.title: Decent selfie stick but Fragile
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stick in 2018 . Its a decent selfie stick which is pretty useful when you are travelling alone or with family. You can built in in Tripod and hence , you don't need to request other people everytime you want a good complete non-selfie picture. The only complaint I have with this is its very fragile and the top of the stick where the iPhone ( or any other phone) needs to be fixed is broken. You need to handle it carefully but with this price the product should be more resistant and durable enough to run minimum for 2 years. Not quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bhuvanesh

customer_reviews.title: Great selfie stick. Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick is great for photo and video. The tripod is an awesome feature. It is super easy to put together and take apart to store in the handy storage bag. The selfie button is an awesome feature as well. I love the varying height options. The only thing I would do different is the locking mechanisms, they are a bit difficult to lock. I give this 5 stars across the board.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: flimsy tripod base broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Used a few times over 3 months. The flimsy joints holding the tripod legs don't hold the legs in place. Hard to see how this design could have been expected to last.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I previously had another selfie stick and it was not nearly as sturdy as this one. Love the longer reach, plus having a tripod to use with the remote. Love it. I would recommend this to anyone looking for something like this. I don't use a selfie stick very often so this will be great for vacations.
customer_reviews.author: gogolf214

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for filming quick videos
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time to record quick videos for my social media channels and it works well. I love that I can adjust the height as well as turn my phone either vertical or horizontal depending on what I’m doing. I didn’t set up the Bluetooth as I haven’t found that I needed it for anything but it’s a good concept. Will be trying it in the future when I use it to take outfit photos.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie D.

customer_reviews.title: Forever changed our family photos
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this selfie stick/stand! It fits my Plus size iPhone vertically and horizontally. Connecting it to the Bluetooth remote was a breeze! Love that it comes with a carrying case. I love how taking family photos with my phone is so easy now!! In the past, my spouse or I would be missing in the photo/video. . .but that is now changed.
customer_reviews.author: @JenniferRiegelman

customer_reviews.title: Versatile tripod/selfie stick with remote
customer_reviews.text: I like shooting videos and images from different angles and this tripod for phone turned out to be a useful product and something that I wanted to try from sometime. Couple of pros of this product are: 1. Length of the stick is really good 2. Remote to click images/video is a really useful item. There are no fancy stickers on this stick and the colour scheme is decent. I feel build quality could have been a little better but it seems a good purchase for the quoted price.
customer_reviews.author: Vishal

customer_reviews.title: Careful when changing Bluetooth remote battery
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth Remote didn’t work, unfortunately. I thought the battery was dead and when I tried to change it the very delicate welding inside snapped. Don’t think it’s worth trying to solder it. The stick and tripod are sturdy enough for an iPhone but I’ll have to buy a better quality Bluetooth remote
customer_reviews.author: colin christian

customer_reviews.title: Going to be great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Great selfie stick for the price, super fast shipper! I put it all together and tested my abilities. Very easy to use and assemble/disassemble. The hand held remote came with battery which is convenient, syncs to Bluetooth really easy, has written instructions. The device comes with carrying case which is a nice addition. Lightweight as well, really solid purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Very well made and extremely versatile
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Very well made and extremely versatile; you can use it as a stand and as a selfie stick. It has large amount of different length and angles settings to choose from. Fits a ZTE phone and an Iphone 8 plus with no problem. Very happy with this product compared to other!
customer_reviews.author: Noah Adam

customer_reviews.title: Best selfie stick ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this selfie stick!! It’s great for solo or couples traveling and for get togethers, when you want to take a group photo and you don’t want to ask someone cuz usually they come out bad or there is no one to ask. It stands sturdy with a phone even in the wind. And it’s long enough to be able to get a better photo of yourself then a plain headshot.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Semenov

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the stick.
customer_reviews.text: The stick itself is great as well as the phone holder. The stick is super sturdy, feels high quality, locks and unlocks to extend very very fast. The tripod base is big enough to hold a cell phone security at urban low wind environments, grass and high wind might challenge it, unlevel surfaces won't work. The tripod base main shortcoming is being very very heavy. The Bluetooth button has the right ergonomics but when linked to my phone (Samsung s9) it's behavior is odd - it sometimes misses presses or doesn't trigger the right functionality in the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Roi Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Selfie Stick; Strong tripod; Remote Control - the Complete Package
customer_reviews.text: This product has a complete package of excellent quality accessories for awesome photo shooting experience. The selfie stick is long and strong. It remains strong even when stretched to its full length with a phone attached. This is helping a lot by minimizing the number of retakes. The remote control is working great. We have so much flexibility with it. Taking selfies is a fun collaborative effort now!! Finally, the tripod. It is strong enough to hold DSLRs while being extremely light. Overall, we are very satisfied with this purchase. We have been using it for about two months now, no complain so far about anything. We highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: shamsia

customer_reviews.title: Great selfie stick and with a lot of more uses
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick is light weight very compact what makes it very easy to carry with you, you can keep it in your pocket easily. The remote control is nicely attached to the stick but also easy to take it out so you can use it with the tripod mode that it has which is great.Also allows you to change the holder and put the one for the action camera which is great, now I don't have with a tripod plus a stick. Very resistant materials and fully extended you get a good length. Great value for this all in one selfie stick.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Short

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick and tripod combo is really nice and helps a lot when recording videos for product review on YouTube. The bluetooth button is very simple to pair, and is also a breeze to connect and disconnect from your phone.
customer_reviews.author: SuperSG

customer_reviews.title: Selfie Stick Of All Selfie Sticks
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Like everyone else, I’ve had selfie sticks in the past but this one is sturdy and so well made. I also love the fact that it comes with a carrying bag for the tripod, stick and phone holder. I can’t wait to use this on my upcoming trips to Alaska and Mexico!
customer_reviews.author: Alottaperspective

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This tripod is nice and tall, and worked perfectly with my GoPro 360. It's easy to use and easy to assemble. I was able to capture some great images using it. And it isn't heavy, but it's sturdy which is a definite plus. I approve.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Reviews

customer_reviews.title: My second selfie stick  - looks much stronger
customer_reviews.text: This is my second selfie stick - looks much stronger- however it has the same type of connection on the top as the previous one so I'm little concerned that it will give way later on. So far I have been using it with Go Pro , Cell phone and might try DSLR - It sturdy enough to hold it. The Bluetooth is very easy to pair with the camera and makes taking picture really easy !
customer_reviews.author: Scott	 Holt

customer_reviews.title: Remote  bluetooth connectivity does not work
customer_reviews.text: The stick is really nice but the remote bluetooth connectivity doesn't work or connect to my phone. My phone sees it but it won't connect. And there is no way to check the remote settings maybe mines is faulty. How depressing I was so looking forward to using this on my vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Shantell

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and solid product!!! Big WOW factor when we opened the box.
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! Very surprised by the quality and versatility of this little selfie stick. The tripod option along with the remote activator make taking pictures a breeze when in remote places. Set up the shot you want and never have to rely on strangers to take your pictures too. Size is just right where it is substantial enough for heavy use yet portable too. Light and easy to pack anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy all in one selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I tried after getting the selfie stick was to check the tripod stability . I tried phone as well as my tablet and both were stable. The good build quality can be felt the moment you hold it in hand. Its all in one selfie stick . With bluetooth remote ,clicking pictures become easier and no vibration. The rubbery handle gives nice grip
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, useful and lightweight..
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to get this selfie stick that can be used as tripod too.. it's so easy to use and light enough to carry along when you travel. Love the bluetooth feature. Now I can capture moments without waiting for someone to click. This is just what I needed..
customer_reviews.author: Thatsmyside

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great value
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product . It’s so easy to use , comes completely ready to go with battery. Comes with very handy storage bag that makes it easy to bring along with you. I have tried and bought others but by far the best. Good quality especially for price !
customer_reviews.author: Alison Drazin

customer_reviews.title: Remote doesn't remotely work well...
customer_reviews.text: I use this to take pictures for work. Blue tooth and Remote button don't stay connected or on. If you need consistency...I would rule this one out. Getting ready to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good selfie stick, Not so good tripod
customer_reviews.text: I do like this tripod when I'm using it handheld. When I'm trying to place it on the ground, it wiggles and it's not too sturdy at all when it's fully extended. It gets more steady the shorter it is but there's always a little bit of sway because the legs don't properly secure to the base. I end up catching some of the tripod in my 360 photos.
customer_reviews.author: Davie Melder

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic rod hidden in the center connecting the shaft to the adapter.
customer_reviews.text: Found this product defective right when I open it. The adapter piece broke off the main shaft(rod) expose cheap plastic in the center. Such a crappy design and it makes me want to curse so bad!!!! How can they use plastic to fill in the center and use that as an adapter to the main rod?????? Retarded!!!
customer_reviews.author: CII

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: 5' stick is very stable and easy to use. Blue tooth controller is OK. Single button, but it connects easy and works. I think the stick itself is great. Long and stable. Has two holders for the phone. You can mount the phone vertically or horizontally. Blue tooth controller can be used for video or photos. Overall nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Harewood

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Found a guy using this on the golf course so he could video his swing. Liked it so much I bought one. Works with my Iphone, GoPro and SLR camera. My son always finds a way to “borrow “ it. Have a hard time getting it back.
customer_reviews.author: L Rad

customer_reviews.title: The best selfie stick / tripod
customer_reviews.text: This is likely the highest quality selfie stick / phone tripod on the market. The craftsmanship and build is top notch, and it looks very sleek. It feels great in hand: solid and secure. The included Bluetooth connector is extremely handy for Selfie and Tri-pod pictures! I’ll be taking this on all my vacations and certainly be using it to film content for my video blogs! Amazing product, well worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Dantes

customer_reviews.title: Great long and light selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of News work and reviews and it is nice to have a very long 5 foot plus selfie for interviews and also for reviews to have a nice angle down on the video. This long selfie stick is worth buying and having in your gear kit. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Baldridge

customer_reviews.title: Tripod that works great.
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick tripod is great. I bought it with the intention of using it to take nice pictures and film. The tripod extends to pretty tall height and it also has a nifty locking feature. I have yet to try out the Bluetooth so i can't really comment on that. However, it works as it should if you're looking for a tripod/ selfie stick for your phone this should do fine.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased with this selfie stick and its accessories. It makes video presentations so easy to do instead of relying on holding a phone and presenting material. I would highly recommend this product to anyone for either personal or professional use.
customer_reviews.author: BZG

customer_reviews.title: Remote control is the issue. But other than that it’s a great product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very great product but there is a few issues. The remote doesn’t stay connected to the Bluetooth for very long. The remote only works with the actual cameras program. When I try to Snapchat or instagram it controls the volume instead of the camera. The remote actually just stopped working all together.
customer_reviews.author: Ljay

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work. I am not happy with the twist and turn to lock the sections for length. I find those break easier. Hopefully this will last longer...only time will tell. I do like the length it can go. Works for slot videos for youtube channel.
customer_reviews.author: Bottom Line

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Great product, Versatile tripod and selfie stick.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I saw that it had included Bluetooth remote control, easy to use, its both option extra long selfi stick and tripod, Well made and worked well! For traveling, it came in handy. Easy Bluetooth connection and very easy to hold phone and digital cameras. Nice Bluetooth remote for taking photos with the selfie stick or on the tripod. Must buy again, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: USMANGEE79

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very good selfie stick. Sturdy, made well, worth the price. Also comes with plenty of accessories. Great starter kit. I wouldn’t look anywhere else, this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and stable for ipad or iphone
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Unfortunately, it is the 3rd one that I bought because there is a part where the ipad or iphone is goes, that is delicate and I broke that twice. For the rest, I really think that it is excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia C. G.

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth remote will not stay connected.
customer_reviews.text: It serves its purpose and was reasonably priced. I am not finding it easy to pull the extensions out and lock them. I can do it, so I'm rating the product "okay", but its not easy. Also, the bluetooth remote, which was one of the main reasons for choosing this will not stay connected. Have tried on several devices and it connects, but less than 15 seconds later, drops the connection. Have contacted support for assistance, but 2 weeks later, still no response.
customer_reviews.author: mandysgma

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth range /battery life
customer_reviews.text: So after using it for almost two years , i can say it a good product for first timers but there are some pros and cons. Pros: Budget Friendly value for money Cons Bluetooth range weight
customer_reviews.author: Amit Kumar kalwani

customer_reviews.title: No way to secure remote control button
customer_reviews.text: Used it one time on a vacation. Bluetooth connectivity was great when paired with iphone x...however the remote control could be easily displaced as there was no way to fasten it securely to the pole. Dropped the remote control a the beach and that was the end of it...not happy with this purchase and definitely will not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MClynn

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Sturdier than I expected. I bought this to use as an easily packable tripod and am impressed!! Easy to put together and disassemble, comes with a carrying case. Great for beginner photography or casual use!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimandmakeup

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great concept and with some fixing it works well now. Remote does not work and no response from the manufacturer. Had to run tap and die on some of the components as the threads were damaged. I ended up purchasing a separate better quality remote. At this price I would buy it again knowing I have the tools to correct any issues it may have.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Smith

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I like it overall but legs don’t handle the weight of iPhone too well, so I can’t imagine how well anything else sits on it. The legs kept slipping. But it is easy to use and good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Plastic clip of the button breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I really want to give it a good review at the beginning, but it became annoying when the plastic button clip snapped and broke easily by accident with some pressure applied. It's no longer able to clip on the handlebar, and I wish there's a replacement that we can get somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Laysie

customer_reviews.title: Broke for no reason ):
customer_reviews.text: I had this thing for a few months, used it to take good pictures, took good care of it and stored it in a safe space because I liked it and it was a little pricier than your average selfie stick - last time o went to attach my phone as described the camera-holding apparatus snapped off the stick. I’m pretty dang upset.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Darrow

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my S9+ keeps cutting off the top of my head and I think I'm starting to get to the age where technology is eluding me, so it was just easier to buy this. Nice and long. Stand and remote work well.
customer_reviews.author: alex lowe

customer_reviews.title: Great tripod
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for trips and group pics. Great price point. It has sturdy legs to hold my plus model phone securely in place. I like that it's compact for travel and comes with a bag. It's quick and easy to set up and take down. If you have any specific questions, feel free to message me @centsibleblonde
customer_reviews.author: CentsibleBlonde

customer_reviews.title: VERY SIMPLE!
customer_reviews.text: The tripod is very useful especially when you need a still shot or video, aswell as timelapses! Also the selfie stick feature helps get shots that can be uncomfortable or demanding, like b-roll or floor shots. Great little portable tripod to have !
customer_reviews.author: Austin.Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my trip!
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick/tripod was great for my trip. I’m a tall girl so the height was exactly what I needed. If you’re headed somewhere windy it will blow over and you’ll need to sit something on it. But other than that it was perfect. I liked that I could move it to take pictures both ways with my phone
customer_reviews.author: Lovely RN

customer_reviews.title: this is one long selfie stick.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool item except you have a rather long item to bring but that's the trade off for having such a long selfie stick. love that its Bluetooth and has a tripod base you can put on the stick. You can set it up walk away and take video or pics.
customer_reviews.author: David Cacace

customer_reviews.title: Cannot replace battery in remote button
customer_reviews.text: For the past 8 months, I really liked this selfie stick for video taping. But when it came tme to replace the battery in the bluetooth remote button, it is impossible to do as the cap for the button does not snap back after you have opened it. So now I have to buy a new selfie stick since Amazon seems to make it impossible to return anything you've owned more than 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L.

customer_reviews.title: Helps Me Record Quality HD Videos NOW With No Movement
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with the tri-pod stand itself. I contacted the seller and they sent out a replacement. People I know who see me use it ask where they can buy one and I point them to Amazon.com and to this specific seller. I am very satisfied with this product and the service that the seller provided with the replacement. This is a great product and performs as advertised. With the tripod feature, I no longer experience pain in my arms when I use my smartphone to record longer HD Videos.
customer_reviews.author: Edward A.

customer_reviews.title: I love the tripod
customer_reviews.text: I love the tripod. Only negative think with my S8 is the button only takes pictures in my camera app. I have to manually start the recording.
customer_reviews.author: Lebron

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up , consistent remote connection, very handy for selfies and phone tripod. I haven't used with DSLR, i simply couldn't risk if it falls. Other than than its a good selfie stick for trip
customer_reviews.author: BN

customer_reviews.title: Just don't!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it at all! First time I intented to use it and it broke down. Such a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA HOLDER
customer_reviews.text: This was a great camera holder, in fact it was so great i started using it to hold other things: coffee, food plates, cereal bowl, laundry, i even brought it to a few bars and carried my drinks around with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Trieu

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good deal! I’m so glad that I decided to purchase. The selfie stick it self can get so long that it’s almost laughable but in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Cain

customer_reviews.title: Battery hard to change now doesn’t work with new battery
customer_reviews.text: I loved this for the 2 months I used it....... then the battery died and when I went to replace it got the old battery out (which was very hard). It no longer worked once I got the new one in? It won’t even turn on anymore!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Doe

customer_reviews.title: Not a great tripod.
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty wobbly, especially when extended all the way as a tripod, and it leans a bit. A breeze could blow it over. Won't really balance unless it's on a completely flat surface. My main disappointment is that it's very hard to get a leveled frame using it because it doesn't have a multidirectional tilting swivel head.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Assembles easily and It is fairly sturdy. The only weakness is the feet of the tripod, which are slender. This can cause it to lean when fully extended. Overall, I still think is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: timbohannon

customer_reviews.title: I haven't even got to use it and its broke already
customer_reviews.text: Trying to follow the instructions that are complete garbage I cannot get the remote housing to stick together after getting the battery into it. I am so done with Amazon best sellers. They might as well just say what it really is which is the world's worst piece of trash. Thank god my camera has a timer and can salvage the pole but seriously don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great product but tripod bent.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Worked great with iPhone X and Note 8. Even used a Sony SLR camera. Tri-pod bent but still stands but at a slant. Contacting Manufacturer now. Will update after.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great item , but
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item besides the phone clamp part won’t keep phone in without falling out , when using as a selfie stick . Does not have a strong hold , on phone device but that is just how it is made . If is a great item , really.
customer_reviews.author: Jett & Buddy

customer_reviews.title: great when taking picture by yourself
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this specifically for our Cancun trip. This stick was great... long reach, good remote, not too small/long. However, when it came to replacing the battery, be very very careful. When I tried to remove the battery, I accidently broke one of the prong holding the battery onto the circuit board. From the looks of the prong welding, it was a weak solder connection.
customer_reviews.author: Thao Moua

customer_reviews.title: Plastic broke
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our trip to Zion. The plastic part that holds your phone is cheap and broke on us. Once it is broken, it can’t be used. The selfie stick and tri pod are very sturdy and it worked well until it broke. We were not rough with it for it to break. The company should re-design the cheap plastic part that connects the stick to the part that holds the phone.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Great length but wiggly
customer_reviews.text: I needed a long mono stand so I got this. Although it works for what I need I noticed it's not very stable. Slight winds will make it wiggle.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service and Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect! It was easy to use for someone who isn't always savy on these type of things. Easy to set up, easy to connect to my phone and love the button remote. I even lost the part that connects the phone to the stand and when I contacted the company they were so easy to work with and fast.
customer_reviews.author: brooksrainy

product_meta.title: Bluetooth Selfie Stick with Tripod, Remote 59Inch MFW Extendable Monopod with Tripod Stand for iPhone 11/11PRO/X/XS max/XR/XS/8/7/6/Plus,Tablet,Samsung S7/S8/S9,Android,GoPro Cameras
feature_bullets: ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT: from 15 inches to 59 inches of elongation, long enough to get a large group photo. the most suitable for 4.72 to 7.87 inches of Tablet PC, 2.75 to 3.74inch smartphone and mobile tripod and monopod gopro camera, iPad, mini projector.

BLUETOOTH REMOTE CONTROL: Wireless bluetooth selfie stick allows you to take picture/video freely from distance ( up to 30 feet). It is suitable for iPhone X,8,7,Samsung Galaxy S7/S8,Sony,HTC,Google Pixel,LG,Android,GoPro Cameras,Digital Cameras Tablet.(Bluetooth may not be compatible with some cameras).

BEST STABLE TRIPOD(10.1-INCH): you can easily switch the Selfie Stick to a tripod and stable shooting.Perfect for any desk or tabletop, uneven surfaces, or wrapped around the back of a chair, railing, branch, or pole!
ANTI-SLIP DURABILITY: it is made from anodized aluminum rod and anti-slip rubber handle of anti-rust, which satisfies all the requirements of the selfie stick, which is rugged and comfortable to use.
HASSLE-FREE WARRANTY : If our products have any quality problems, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with a friendly online service.
